attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

Singapore Hwa Chi Lin had pressed some influencial members to death unneccessary in Italy.

Hwa Chi Lin establish 10% friendship with Italy Prime Minister.

Please sent an England team of Ministers of European Ministers to take back the heart of Italy Prime Minister, back to European Union, and kick Hwa Chi Lin's influencial out of Italy.

If Hwa Chi Lin have 100% influencial in Europe, he won't have 75 GBP to pay. If he have 50%, he would do 50%. 

regards

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
